footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Hu Tao | Update Date: 08/30/2022 | Editor: LordOfEnnui#8710

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Staff of Homa__
Completely unrivalled (but also far from necessary - don't spend money on png like me), it increases the value of HP on her even more. She will practically always be below 50%, so its passive will be fully active. A CRIT Rate circlet is recommended.

**4 Star Options:**
__Dragon's Bane__
EM stat and extra DMG Bonus are great on Hu Tao. Its low Base Attack doesn't matter as much due to her Elemental Skill's buff. The extra EM increases her damage in Overvape teams, and makes Dragon's Bane even better. 

__Deathmatch__
Pretty unconditionally good, helps soothe Hu Tao's eternal hunger for more CRIT Rate substats.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Winged-Spear__
Hu Tao can stack the passive relatively slowly. The ATK% is still valuable, but not as good as on other characters.

__Lithic Spear__
Somewhat conditional. This position is based on running both Hu Tao and Xingqiu. Running more Liyue characters or higher refinements will move this weapon much further up, to the point that an R5 4Liyue spear is her second best option after Staff of Homa. As Hu Tao tends to run lots of Liyue characters like Yelan and Zhongli, the spear can be very effective.

__White Tassel R5__
Hu Tao's dual scaling makes a 3 star weapon good on her. Most other weapons listed here are only ~10% more damage than it, and it is about as good as a Blackcliff Pole.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Although 4-piece Crimson Witch of Flames is Hu Tao's best set, it is only better than 4-piece Shimenawa's Reminiscence by a very small margin. As Momiji-Dyed Court contains both Shimenawa's Reminiscence and Emblem of Severed Fate (the best set for Hu Tao's dedicated Hydro supports), it is recommended that you farm that domain instead if you're just starting to build Hu Tao.
